claim: The label of the 2nd group of bars from the top is 'Female entrants'.

The labeling clearly indicates that the second group corresponds to female entrants, as shown by the distinct color coding and the arrangement of the bars.

The chart visually indicates that the private consumption values are not close to 0.1, thus refuting the claim.

claim: The value lost due to electrical outages in 2006 was 0.6% less than in 2009.
